snippet: The former Miami coach Tony Sparano figures to emphasize a power-running game for the Jets’ offense.
abstract: New York Jets hire former Miami Dolphins coach Tony Sparano to replace offensive coordinator Brian Schottenheimer; move seems to signal desire by Jets to return to a power-running team.
lead_paragraph: The former Miami coach Tony Sparano figures to emphasize a power-running game for the Jets’ offense.

headline.seo: Jets Name Sparano as Offensive Coordinator
headline.main: New Assistant Reflects What Jets Want to Be
headline.print_headline: New Assistant Reflects What Jets Want to Be
